src:
陳亞蘭日操16小時賣命　經紀人送雙人機票原因超暖
02 Nov 2019, 08:17 by 梁欣喬, 李鍾泉
歌仔戲小生天王陳亞蘭今（2日）舉辦生日會，現場狂撩上百粉，她一出場，就用電眼對粉絲放電，完成粉絲想與她眼神交流心願。歌壇天后A-lin送上花籃祝福，她演唱《忠孝節義》第三單元主題曲「斷機教子」主題曲。陳亞蘭台上也與第一單元「萬古流芳」的娘子葉麗娜重現劇中轉圈圈戲碼，更宣布將舉辦「公益辦桌」回饋社會。
陳亞蘭為戲日操16小時，透露這兩年做了很多事情，除就讀台師大GF-EMBA外，還身兼電視歌仔戲《忠孝節義》執行製作人，以及推出歌仔戲舞台劇《黑家店2：萬古流芳》，自豪體力跟以往毫無差別，更認為自己靠著意志力與衝勁在拼，笑說以前的身體還比較虛，朋友看到她現況打趣說她可以參加鐵人三項。


陳亞蘭台上也與第一單元「萬古流芳」的娘子葉麗娜重現劇中轉圈圈戲碼。

陳亞蘭經記人陳秀卿看到她日操16小時為戲賣命，連好好與她說話談心的時間都沒有，體貼送上日本雙人來回機票與雞精補充體力，要她好好休息度假，經記人笑說，「送日本雙人機票不是小氣，而是亞蘭姐不習慣一個人，而且已她現在虛累累情況，不適合走太遠。」驚喜送禮，讓陳亞蘭直呼感動。
更新時間｜2019.11.02 08:15
text:
Chen Yalan is a 16-hour life-selling agent.
02 Nov 2019, 08:17 by Liang Xinqiao, Li Zhongquan
Chen Yalan, the singer of Xiaozi Tian, held a birthday party on the 2nd. The scene was full of hundreds of powders. When she appeared, she used electric eyes to discharge the fans, and the fans wanted to communicate with her eyes. A-lin sent a basket of blessings to the singer, and she sang the theme song of the third unit theme song "Break the Son" of "Zhongxiao Festival". Chen Yalan also replayed the drama in the drama with the first unit "Wan Liu Liu Fang", and announced that she would hold a "public welfare table" to give back to the community.
Chen Yalan has been doing 16 hours of drama, revealing that she has done a lot of things in the past two years. In addition to attending the GF-EMBA of Taiwan Normal University, she also worked as a producer of the TV Taiwanese drama "Zhongxiao Festival" and launched the Taiwanese drama stage "Black House 2: Wan Gu Liu Fang, proud of physical strength is no different from the past, but also believe that relying on willpower and enthusiasm in the fight, laughing that the previous body is still relatively empty, friends see her current situation, joking that she can participate in the triathlon.


Chen Yalan also replayed the drama in the drama with the first unit "Wan Liu Liu Fang".

Chen Yalan, a memorator of Chen Yalan, saw her playing for 16 hours as a show, and she didn’t even have time to talk to her. She sent me a round-trip ticket to Japan and chicken to replenish her strength. She asked her to take a rest and rest. "Send a Japanese double ticket is not stingy, but Alan sister is not used to a person, and she is now too tired, not suitable for going too far." Surprise gift, let Chen Yalan directly moved.
Update time|2019.11.02 08:15
